Insurance Program

An exclusive service that connects our partners with our network of preferred insurance brokers and carriers.

Through the scale of our portfolio and long-standing industry relationships, we give access to competitive pricing and tailored coverages that may not be available on the open market. Our partners benefit from the same leverage we use to manage our own real estate assets and businesses, ensuring comprehensive protection and cost savings.

Built on Trion's Scale, Expertise, and Trust

Top-Tier Insurance Partners

Get direct access to preferred brokers and carriers with deep expertise in real estate and commercial coverage.

Volume-Based Pricing Advantage

Leverage the collective power of the Trion Holdings portfolio to unlock more competitive rates than you'd typically get as a standalone policyholder.

Comprehensive Coverage Options

Choose from a wide range of property, liability, umbrella, and specialty policies — tailored to the specific risks and requirements of your business or portfolio.

Aligned with Trion's Expertise

Enjoy peace of mind knowing your coverage is designed with the same standards and scrutiny we apply to our own holdings — because your risk is our risk.

Who It's For

The Trion Holdings Insurance Program is designed for those who require more than a one-size-fits-all approach to risk management. If you're managing property or business assets and want access to tailored policies, preferred carriers, and Trion’s scale-driven pricing advantages, this program is built for you.

Ideal candidates include:

  • Real estate investors looking to lower costs across multiple properties
  • Business owners who need to safeguard physical assets, employees, and liabilities
  • Property managers seeking bundled solutions or multi-policy management
  • Private equity or acquisition partners who need insurance aligned with post-deal strategies
18%

One of our partners reduced their annual premiums by 18% by joining the program.

Why Choose Trion?

When it comes to insurance, brokers sell you a policy—Trion stands beside you. As both an operator and investor, we buy insurance not just for you, but with you. That means we negotiate based on scale, experience, and shared risk—not commission.

Whether you're evaluating new coverage or just want a second opinion, our team can help you compare your current policy to our preferred options. No pressure, no obligation—just smarter coverage.

What sets us apart:

  • We negotiate from experience, not sales quotas
  • Our incentives are aligned—your risk is our risk
  • We leverage portfolio-wide pricing power
  • We've built trust through decades of hands-on ownership
